channel.title: Interface Text!
channel.description:
Please help me I have a Interface in my server which I have text being sent to but it is NOT showing up.. This is how it looks...
c.SendQuest("Server Information", 2248) c.SendQuest("Agree", 2247) c.SendQuest("(Click Agree To Continue On..)", 2275)
c.SendQuest("Welcome to Rune-Kingdom", 13589) <--- This is the text I want to send c.SendQuest("Welcome to Rune-Kingdom", 2266) <--- The other ID.
Here's the ID's for the Interface...
[code] 2247 - Agree 2248 - Server Information 2275 - Click Agree 2266 - Text 13589 - ljtitle [/code]
Please help :)

item.title: Interface Text!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I don’t get it, you just want to change IDs, or is there actually something wrong with 2266?

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Text!
item.dc:creator: @shadytheone shadytheone
item.description:
@shadytheone wrote:

i dont think 13589 will work …

just try 2266

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Text!
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Please help me I have a Interface in my server which I have text being sent to but it is NOT showing up… This is how it looks…

c.SendQuest(“Server Information”, 2248)
c.SendQuest(“Agree”, 2247)
c.SendQuest("(Click Agree To Continue On…)", 2275)

c.SendQuest(“Welcome to Rune-Kingdom”, 13589) <— This is the text I want to send
c.SendQuest(“Welcome to Rune-Kingdom”, 2266) <— The other ID.

Here’s the ID’s for the Interface…

2247 - Agree
2248 - Server Information
2275 - Click Agree
2266 - Text
13589 - ljtitle

Please help

Read full topic
